author: Wes McQuillen
title: What are qualifying conditions for a medical cannabis card?
shortAnswer: In order to qualify for a medical marijuana card, you must suffer from one of the conditions listed and have a doctor’s recommendation that marijuana will help relieve that condition. The complete list of qualifying conditions can be found in the Nevada Revised Statutes, Chapter 453A, Section 050.
